message: Awesome, thanks for the info and the update - I'll try this out. Regarding the R version on tidygeocoder, yes that was a typo. I've fixed it on the master branch so you can install from there for now: [https://github.com/jessecambon/tidygeocoder/issues/35](https://github.com/jessecambon/tidygeocoder/issues/35)
message_html: Awesome, thanks for the info and the update - I’ll try this out. Regarding the R version on tidygeocoder, yes that was a typo. I’ve fixed it on the master branch so you can install from there for now: https://github.com/jessecambon/tidygeocoder/issues/35
